title: Research & Code Implementation
description: Explore cutting-edge quantum computing research papers with practical code implementations and performance analysis.

sections.title: Own Research
sections.description: Original research contributions from our team.

children.title: Machine Learning Models for Natural Disaster Prediction
children.description: Development of advanced machine learning models for predicting natural disasters using multi-modal data sources including satellite imagery, meteorological data, and historical patterns.

children.title: CaPRA-Tree: A High-Performance Indexing B-Tree-type Structure for Next-Generation Database Systems
children.description: Novel B-Tree-type indexing structure designed for next-generation database systems, featuring improved cache performance and reduced I/O operations for large-scale data management.

sections.title: Algorithm Research
sections.description: Research papers focusing on quantum algorithm development and optimization.

children.title: QAOA for MaxCut Problems
children.description: Implementation of QAOA for solving MaxCut problems on various graph topologies with performance benchmarks.

children.title: VQE for Molecular Systems
children.description: VQE implementation for finding ground states of molecular Hamiltonians with error mitigation techniques.

sections.title: Quantum Machine Learning
sections.description: Research at the intersection of quantum computing and machine learning.

children.title: Quantum Neural Networks for Classification
children.description: Implementing quantum neural networks for classical data classification tasks.

sections.title: Quantum Cryptography
sections.description: Research in quantum cryptography and post-quantum security.

children.title: BB84 Quantum Key Distribution
children.description: Implementation and security analysis of the BB84 quantum key distribution protocol.

sections.title: Quantum Algorithms Research
sections.description: Comprehensive research collection on quantum algorithms and their implementations.

children.title: Quantum Algorithms Collection
children.description: Comprehensive research collection on quantum algorithms, from theoretical foundations to practical implementations.
